feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Manufacturing Integration and Intelligence

entry.title: How to get Email ID from Netweaver UME in MII
entry.content:
Hello All,

We are using SAP MII 15.1. For one page, we need to show user details including Email id. From this URL, - https://server:port/XMII/Illuminator?service=admin&mode=userattriblist&Group=<user name>, we are able to get details but not Email id. 

How to get Email id also from the UME thru url?

Thanks,

Senthil

entry.title: MII suddenly: src-error on xsd file
entry.content:
Hi, maybe someone can help us with this.

After running fine for years, suddenly we have this error in our MII system.

i checked the xsd file but all seems fine:

I dont know how to solve this problem, I reuploaded the xsd file, checked it, an tested it on another system where it works fine.

Any ideas?

Thank you an regards

entry.title: How to handle the single quote in json structure in SAP MII
entry.content: We have one transaction in which XML file is coming and we are converting that file to Json structure. After converting file, in Json we have some single quote values in it because of this Json is getting corrupted and we are not able to send this to other system. Can anyone suggest what logic we create to that one particular field we need to change from single quote so that Json doesn't get corrupted.

entry.title: I need to fetch the e-mail address of the logged in user. There are no attributes for this in 15.5.
entry.content:
For getting the discontinued attributes like email details, there are no options currently available. The custom ways are deploying another J2EE block or using Webservices in Netweaver. 

Please, suggest any alternative.

entry.title: STEPS TO USE MD04 IN SAP MM MODULE AND PROCUREMENT PROCESS.
entry.content:
Hello ,

As MD04 is very important t-code in SAP MM module and It is used to calculate  demand and stock . Can you please tell the criteria to use MD04 while converting PR to PO and also the necessary elements need to be checked while placing PO like Delivery date, rescheduling date , dependent requirement etc.

entry.title: Status update in S4 HANA not happening during Engineering order execution in SAP ME
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have created an Engineering order in SAP S4 HANA and released to SAP ME, During the Engineering order execution in SAP ME, I have started the operation, consumed few components (Assembling) and completed few operations.

even after completing the operations, I couldn't see any yield conf./component consumption messages in MII queue which resulted in status not getting updated in S4 system. for normal Prod. orders, it's working fine. but this issue is with Engineering order type.

could it be issue with any of the configuration in workflow or from ME settings?

can you please help me in here.

Thank You!

entry.title: Standalone As-Built Configuration in SAP ME - Excess component Qty removal
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have stuck at a point while developing a custom solution for Excess qty removal for components in SFCs.

Issue: Due to changes in BOM in S4 after order release and start of execution in SAP ME, there is an error during the completion of the operation "Check config for <<SFC>> reports <<QTY>> missing <<component>>, 0 excess, 0 non-BOM and 0 test part Components (Message 13920)". upon checking, found that due to changes, there is an excess qty for the component is available, using standalone As-Built configuration activity, we were able to return the excess qty for an SFC but it's taking huge efforts to return for each SFC.

So, I have started developing a solution where the input will be the shop order and all the SFCs with the excess qty in the component should be returned.
I'm able to fetch the excess qty info from SFC_ASSY & SFC_ASSY_LOG tables.

I tried to use removeComponents PAPI but getting an error while executing the MII transaction.

can you please let me know if there is any standard service/solution is available to return the excess qty.

Thank You!

entry.title: IDOC Message's Column is Different on SAP and MII
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

In our factory, our planning department creates work orders on SAP and this work orders comes to MII side with IDoc messages. 

IDoc Message Type's name is ZPP_BIAS. And we're using it for 2 years without problem. This month, our SAP department added a new column in ZPP_BIAS IDoc Messages, it's name is KAPTPROG.

When we're creating a new message, column named KAPTPROG is seen on WE02 page. But when this message comes to MII side, this KAPTPROG column is not showing. I added two files to this message which is SAP and MII side XML's.

We checked everything on SAP for any lack of configuration but we couldn't find it. We believe problem is on MII side. On MII, we using SAPMEINT_INBOUND_QUEUE for processing rule for incoming IDoc messages. 

So, any one of you have ever experienced a problem like this ? Or any one of you knows the solution for this problem ? Thanks advance.

Alper

entry.title: Unable to browse tags on Plant Connectivity (PCo) UA server
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have created a OPC UA server from a socket source as below

Socket source -> Agent -> OPC UA Server

I have then created a OPC UA source system and am trying to browse tags on the OPC UA Server created as above.

I am expecting to see subscription item of the agent as one of the tags but I do not see it. I see only system tags for PCo there.

Am I missing anything?

entry.title: Mass data upload/enhance tool in SAP DM
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Use case: we are seeing the requirement to have the mass upload tool for SAP DM where we can upload/enhance the master data using this tool as we have data in excel/csv format.

For e.g.: customer is having so many data collection parameter and NC logging reason codes in the system so manually it will take lot of efforts and chances of error in configuration is very high. 

in ME/MII  we had the ability to develop the custom action block and deploy in MII and then we can call the API's of SAP ME to configure the data. Similar like functionality looking in SAP DM.

Has anyone also faced the similar challenge in their case and how you have overcome to this challenge. Just wanted to check the opinion of the community. 

One approach i am seeing to develop a application/extension using Business application studio other then that if any other approaches are there please feel free to share the thoughts.

Regards,
Ankit Gupta

entry.title: Standard reports for PP& QM with analytical in sap s4hana public cloud 2502.
entry.content:
Hello, experts.
As I am implementing the first project in the public cloud, grow with SAP in the PP & QM module in discrete manufacturing. I have an idea on some apps like Monitor Production/Planned Orders, Display Stock Overview, Manage Production Orders, Manage Production Operation, and Process Inspection Lots.

But the business requirement is something different than

1) They want machine-wise orders that are in process with m/c utilization capacity in graphical or tabular format .

2) The second requirement is that the sequence of orders on every machine—i.e., if a business created 10 orders to be executed for a particular day, they want to give a sequence number to be executed on that machine. Is this possible in the public cloud with any standard SAP Fiori apps?

entry.title: How to upload jar file in MII to consume in JSP page
entry.content:
Hello Folks,

Am creating a JSP page in SAP MII which is using a custom jar file. How can I upload the jar file in SAP MII to get the reference in JSP page.

I have tried the following but no luck.

1) Uploaded jar files in the same way we upload custom actions blocks.

2)Uploaded jar file in web folder 

currently I am getting error while jsp compilation due to missing class file.

Am on SAP MII 15.1 SP5

 

 

Any help on this very much appreciated.

 

Thanks

Shaji

entry.title: Failed to connect remote VM. Connection refused in NWDS
entry.content:
Hi All,

I have NWDS app in Citrix and configured the ME java project and created debug configuration.

Then started debugging, first time it worked and if I logoff and login ME and if If I try debugging it returns the error as  "Failed to connect remote VM. Connection refused in NWDS".

If I created new workspace, then again it worked for first time and and next time it is returning same error.

Could you pls some help to resolve this issue.

Here using the port as 50121.

 

 

Regards,

Bikshapati.

entry.title: PCo CONFIGURATIONS
entry.content:
Note: My previous account was marked as a former member(former_member532862). As a result, I am re-posting my blogs here for continued reference and visibility.


PCo:


PCo is known as Plant Connectivity. This tool is used to connect different plant applications. SAP MII has a dedicated PCo connector  to communicate with PCo.

In this document we will cover



  • Save file



  • Read file



  • OPC connection

 


PCo Panels:

 



Save file via PCo:


Steps:



  • Create a folder to save file

 

 

 



 



  • Create a source system to save file the folder

 

 

 





  • Create an agent using the source system



    • Enable the checkbox Run Agent Instance as an Executable

 

 

 

 

 









    • Configure the Query Ports

 

 

 

 

 





  • Create the PCo connector at MII

 

 

 





  • Use PCo query to send the file

 

 

 



Tag store Query

 



Execute the query

 



Result:



  • File created at the source folder

 

 

 



Read File Via PCo:





  • Create a File monitoring source system to read the folder

 

 

 





  • Create an agent using the File monitoring source system



    • Subscribe File Contain and File Name

 

 

 

 

 



Create a notification

 



Subscribe the output elements

 



Select a destination transaction

 





  • Result:The destination Transaction gets executed on creation of a new file in the folder.

Connect OPC Via PCo – Write Values in tag:





    • Create a OPC DA source system to connect KEP Wear

 

 

 

 

 



 

Connect OPC Via PCo – Send OPC Notification:





  • Create a OPC DA source system to connect KEP Wear

 

 

 



Subscribe the tags needed

 



Create a notification and add a trigger condition

 



Add the output elements

 



Select a destination transaction

 



 

Result:

On change on the values of the tag, the destination transition gets executed.

 

 

Note: When we create an agent, it creates an windows service.

 



OPC connection from MII





  • Create a OPC DA source system for MII

 


 

 



Configure the query Ports

 



Create a PCo connection in MII. * Shown above.

Create a PCo query to send data to OPC tag.

MII agent and windows Services


“Run agent instance as an executable” – In most of the implementations, we enabled this checkbox when we needed the agent to be used from an outside system like SAP MII. We also differentiated the agents by two categories:



  1. Agents will subscribe items and will send notification



  1. Agents will only work as a connector for the MII system

 


The agents which subscribe and notifies MII are always needed to be running to keep reading the subscribed items. Whereas for the 2nd type of agents do not have any subscription item and will only listen to the port for any incoming request. So, the second type of agents does not require to run as a service always.

We realized when we enable the “Run agent instance as an executable”, the service is in stopped condition but still working as desired.

Example Screenshots below:

 



 

 



 

 

 



 

After categorizing the agents as above, we saw the server resource utilization decreased comparing before when we used to create the agents by disabling “Run agent instance as an executable”.

entry.title: User SAPSR3DB does not exist during an SAP Netweaver fresh installation
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I'm installing SAP Netweaver 7.5 on a new windows server and I'm receiving an error "user 'SAPSR3DB' does not exist", but i think this is not usually done manually and not sure which issues that may cause.

I did create SAPSR3DB manually (with authorizations CONNECT, RESOURCE, DBA, UNLIMITED TABLESPACE), but then i face another error "tablespace 'PSAPTEMP' does not exist".

Guess i'm not supposed to create such database objects manually so i'm beginning to think that something is wrong with this installation, although i'm not understanding what. Dropped the users and restarted this installation from zero, and i stop in this exact same error.

Thank you in advance to whoever might help.

Kind regards, Pedro

entry.title: SAP ME/MII msg type yieldConfirmationRequest goes into RETRY status and MESYS blocks reservation
entry.content:
Hi Experts ,

 

Did you faced these behaviours:

     SAP ME/MII native message type yieldConfirmationRequest goes always into RETRY status when is processed for the

first time and only when the message is re-processed , the second time , it goes into correct status PASSED ; This is not good

at all because it increasing the processing time of the messages inside the MII queue ;

     The second behavior is that the componentAddRequest message always goes first into FAILED status with the message:

User MESYS blocks the reservation xxxxxxxxxxxx  ; Those kind of failed messages became PASSED only if they are manually RETRY; This is not good also because a time consuming manually intervention is needed  ;

    The above behaviours appeared after we installed: 

                                    SAP ME 15.5 Patch 43 first and then Patch 44 , SAP XMII 15.5.2.1 and  SAP MII_ADMIN 15.5.2.1 ;

    Thank you in advance for your help !

 

Best Regards,

Paul

entry.title: How to use JCO3 in MII with SSO
entry.content:
Hi

Switching to JCO3 (due to INT8), but cannot get it to work with SSO, error is "Initialisation of destination XXX failed : connection already closed".

It works fine in non-sso scenario.

Thanks in advance

Nick

entry.title: SAP MII workbench for SAP ME 15.5 upgrade is not opening with Java 8 461
entry.content:
Hi, my SAP ME system is upgraded to ME 15.5. I am able to open workbench for the Dev server, Q server and also a different sandbox server. After the company refreshed Production data (SAP ME) into the sandbox system, the workbench for the sandbox server was not opening. I am getting this error. 

I am having the latest java version. (recommended by BASIS Team to install)

Can anybody help me on this?

entry.title: Production Orders created for a specific line are not showing up in SAP ME
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts. 

Our client has 5 SPC Lines. When we create production order for these SPC Lines, the order is assigned to the workcenter as SPC1 (Operation 0020) and SPCW1(Operation 0010) for SPC Line 1. We can see the order in MES system for SPC Line 1 which is a custom screen designed using MII BLS and UI5. When the IDOC is released to MES, it get's processed by a Workflow configured in MII (XSLT file) and the data is stored in MES. 

When we create orders for SPC5 line and released into MES, the order is not visible in MES SPC Line 5 screen. The order has been processed successfully, also available in Shop order maintenance. I also checked in the ROUTER_OPERATION Table in MII, both the 0010 and 0020 operations are available for the order. 

Is there a way to understand why we are not able to see the SPC5 order in the MES screen?

entry.title: Production Orders created for a line are not showing up in SAP MES
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts. 

Our client has 5 SPC Lines. When we create production order for these SPC Lines, the order is assigned to the workcenter as SPC1 (Operation 0020) and SPCW1(Operation 0010) for SPC Line 1. We can see the order in MES system for SPC Line 1 which is a custom screen designed using MII BLS and UI5. When the IDOC is released to MES, it get's processed by a Workflow configured in MII (XSLT file) and the data is stored in MES. 

When we create orders for SPC5 line and released into MES, the order is not visible in MES SPC Line 5 screen. The order has been processed successfully, also available in Shop order maintenance. I also checked in the ROUTER_OPERATION Table in MII, both the 0010 and 0020 operations are available for the order. 

Is there a way to understand why we are not able to see the SPC5 order in the MES screen?
